title: Annan briefs media in Syria
description: The UN special envoy to Syria, Kofi Annan briefed at a press conference in Damascus of Syria on May 29, 2012. Annan arrived in Syria on Monday for his ceasefire plan with all parties in the country.
cleanContent:
The UN special envoy to Syria, Kofi Annan is seen at a press conference in Damascus of Syria on May 29, 2012.Annan arrived in Syria on Monday for his ceasefire plan with all parties in the country. (Xinhua/Hazim)

The UN special envoy to Syria, Kofi Annan briefs at a press conference in Damascus of Syria on May 29, 2012. Annan arrived in Syria on Monday for his ceasefire plan with all parties in the country. (Xinhua/Hazim)

The UN special envoy to Syria, Kofi Annan briefs at a press conference in Damascus of Syria on May 29, 2012. Annan arrived in Syria on Monday for his ceasefire plan with all parties in the country. (Xinhua/Hazim)
